doc.title: I'm Standing Here: Iceland
doc.plot: I'm Standing Here - Iceland is a travel show that showcases people and families from different regions of the world. We strive to show that despite the cultural and environmental differences, people and families are all very much the same: we all face the same issues, the same challenges, the same laughs, and the same cries. Despite our unique cultures and customs, the common bonds of the human spirit, the family characteristics and basic human moral values are common to all people and families everywhere in the world. The show incorporates interviews and video images and is available through Amazon.com
